comment._content: The cars look like mid-30's Plymouths.

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Howard33 - Sir Thomas Henley died on 14 May 1935 - so the cars would be a good match. His funeral was held on 16 May 1935 at Field of Mars Cemetery preceded by a service in the Grimm Memorial Presbyterian Church, Drummoyne. The funeral is reported on page 13 of the Sydney Morning Herald - 17 May 1935: news.google.com/newspapers?id=wk0QAAAAIBAJ&sjid=95EDA... funeral&pg=7303,2784268 With regard to vehicles it states only, " Five car loads of flowers preceded the cortege."
